plot: Unemployed and with a wife and daughter to support, Frank turns for help to the wealthy father who disowned him. When his plea is rejected, a desperate Frank turns to robbery.
title: A Touch of Nature
plot_es: Unemployed and with a wife and daughter to support, Frank turns for help to the wealthy father who disowned him. When his plea is rejected, a desperate Frank turns to robbery.
plot_en: Unemployed and with a wife and daughter to support, Frank turns for help to the wealthy father who disowned him. When his plea is rejected, a desperate Frank turns to robbery.
